items.en: Overseas game a 'sacrifice' for 'survival' of Serie A - Como
items.text_for_match: Overseas game a 'sacrifice' for 'survival' of Serie A - Como Italian club Como say "sacrifice is essential" to ensure the "survival" of Serie A amid the financial dominance of the Premier League as they press ahead with plans to play AC Milan in Perth, Australia. Italian club Como say "sacrifice is essential" to ensure the "survival" of Serie A amid the financial dominance of the Premier League as they press ahead with plans to play AC Milan in Perth, Australia.

items.ja: Three players, 57 goals - who is the best striker?
items.en: Three players, 57 goals - who is the best striker?
items.text_for_match: Three players, 57 goals - who is the best striker? BBC Sport looks at the goalscoring exploits of Harry Kane, Kylian Mbappe and Erling Haaland, who are all averaging more than a goal a game. BBC Sport looks at the goalscoring exploits of Harry Kane, Kylian Mbappe and Erling Haaland, who are all averaging more than a goal a game.

items.ja: 'He's giving us a lot of joy' - Rashford's revival at Barcelona
items.en: 'He's giving us a lot of joy' - Rashford's revival at Barcelona
items.text_for_match: 'He's giving us a lot of joy' - Rashford's revival at Barcelona Marcus Rashford came to Barcelona to revive a spluttering career, and so far he is making a good job of that task, but it remains early days in Spain for the England forward. Marcus Rashford came to Barcelona to revive a spluttering career, and so far he is making a good job of that task, but it remains early days in Spain for the England forward.
